data.persona: I am looking for a new place to live.  I have been to many places.  My life is on the road and I like it what way.
data.description:
You are in the Warehouses.
The warehouses are the largest structures in the port, rising well above the adjoining buildings. Constructed from virgin timber, the beams overhead support lofts that are filled to capacity with boxes, crates, and barrels full of goods from all over the world. Carefully checking each parcel that crosses the doorway, the warehouse manager knows exactly where everything belongs inside.
There's some bushy fur and a product here.
A person and a salesman are here.

You are carrying a tattered map, a compass, and a jug that holds the wine the servants fill glasses with, wearing a belt and a ceremonial hat, and wielding a hammer.

            "desc": "The warehouses are the largest structures in the port, rising well above the adjoining buildings. Constructed from virgin timber, the beams overhead support lofts that are filled to capacity with boxes, crates, and barrels full of goods from all over the world. Carefully checking each parcel that crosses the doorway, the warehouse manager knows exactly where everything belongs inside.",
            "extra_desc": "The warehouse manager wasn't always an anxious man, but last year, some foreign sailors raided the warehouse and stole twelve casks of the finest rum. The owner of the warehouse threatened to send him away on the next ship if anything went missing again. He watches with a keen eye, now, fearful of losing his livelihood, or even his life.",

data.short_motivation: I want to steal this person's money and belongings to help find a place to live.
data.mid_motivation: I want to have a place where I can lay my head and rest from traveling for a month or so.
data.long_motivation: I want to rest and relax so that I can go on another exciting adventure.
